title: Pls fix that 20 minutes queue
body: Yesterday im playin lol ranks normally but my pc crash so i restart my pc and now it took to me to wait 20 minutes . Today i played again  i waited 20 minutes and my signal just gone and he took to me to wait 5 game 20 minute again now im playing again. MY pc crash and now i took to wait 5 fukcing 20 minutes pls fix that

replies.body:
Hi, this is the italian board and you must speak italian to post there :D 
Read [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), talk about Leaverbuster, and if you need more support ask in the correct board. Thanks!
